sk1.name: Storm Hammer
sk1.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

sk2.name: Great Cleave
sk2.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

sk3.name: Warcry
sk3.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor. Lasts 7 seconds.

sk4.name: God's Strength
sk4.desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.
